channel.title: Does anybody know how to fix this error
channel.description: report player.java:6: class ReportPlayer is public, should be declared in a file named ReportPlayer.java public class ReportPlayer { ^ Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: SYIBlocker.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Does anybody know how to fix this error
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

does anybody got the class for this that hes talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: Does anybody know how to fix this error
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Aeolian., post:8, topic:294787”][quote author=blacksabath link=topic=389864.msg2911419#msg2911419 date=1250115416]
well i dont get it this is what i have in the report player.java file
import java.io.;
import java.text.DateFormat;
import java.text.;
import java.util.*;

—>public class ReportPlayer {<----
^

[/quote]

You know whats funny. - You Guys are really dumb, Sorry.

Delete This Off Your Player.java.

Ctrl+F = public class ReportPlayer {[/quote]

No, If he did that he would have a complete class without any class declaration. He needs to create a file called ReportPlayer.java, put the class inside of it, then call the class when he needs to use it. He will most likely call this class from the packet that handles the report abuse button. Whichever one that is. :S

Read full topic
item.source: Does anybody know how to fix this error

item.title: Does anybody know how to fix this error
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

well i dont get it this is what i have in the report player.java file
import java.io.;
import java.text.DateFormat;
import java.text.;
import java.util.*;

public class ReportPlayer {

// Defines the format of the date. Ex: 19/4/2009
String date = new SimpleDateFormat("dd/MM/yyyy").format(new Date());

// Defines the format of the time. Ex: 07:04:19
String time = new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss").format(new Date());

// A player can only report another player if:
// The other player is online
// They are not reporting themselves
// They have not reported someone within 60 seconds
void reportPlayer(final client c) {

	// Converts the byte to the players name
	String receivedPlayerName = misc.longToPlayerName(c.inStream
			.readQWord());

	// This method reads 1 byte from the Message Data buffer, starting with
	// the byte referred to by DataOffset and returns it as an Integer
	// (signed 2-byte) integer value in the range 0 to 255.
	int rule = c.inStream.readUnsignedByte();

	// Returns the time left before the next report is allowed
	int timer = c.reportTimer / 2;

	// If there is a valid report the report information is printed onto the
	// Server command prompt
	if (receivedPlayerName != null
			&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
			&& c.reportTimer == 0 && receivedPlayerName != c.playerName) {
		System.out.println("[Server Report]: " + c.playerName
				+ " reported " + receivedPlayerName);
	}
	switch (rule) {

	// Rule 1: Offensive Language
	case 0:

		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false
				|| c.playerName == receivedPlayerName) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0 && receivedPlayerName != c.playerName) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Offensive language");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 2: Item Scamming
	case 1:

		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Item Scamming");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 3: Password Scamming
	case 2:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Password Scamming");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 4: Bug Abuse
	case 3:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Bug Abuse");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 5: Staff Impersonation
	case 4:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Staff Impersonation");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 6: Account Sharing
	case 5:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Acount sharing / trading");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 7: Macroing
	case 6:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Macroing");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 8: Multiple Logging
	case 7:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Multi Logging in");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 9: Encouraging others to break rules
	case 8:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Making others break rules");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 10: Abuse of Customer Support
	case 9:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Misuse of customer support");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 11: Advertising Website
	case 10:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Advertising / website");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;

	// Rule 12: Real World Item trading
	case 11:
		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == false) {
			c.sM("That player isn't online.");
		} else if (receivedPlayerName != null
				&& server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(receivedPlayerName) == true
				&& c.reportTimer == 0) {
			report(receivedPlayerName + " Got reported by " + c.playerName
					+ " for Real world item trading");
			c.sM("Thank you for reporting " + receivedPlayerName
					+ " to our staff.");
			c.reportTimer = 120;
		} else if (c.reportTimer != 0) {
			c.sM("You must wait " + timer
					+ " seconds before reporting another user.");
		}
		break;
	}
}

// Writes recieved data to a specified file
// Makes use of the java.io functions, Buffered Writer, etc
void report(String msg) {

	BufferedWriter bw = null;

	try {
		bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./reports/Reports.txt",
				true));
		bw.write(msg + " | On " + date + " At " + time);
		bw.newLine();
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} catch (IOException ioe) {
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} finally {
		if (bw != null)
			try {
				bw.close();
			} catch (IOException ioe2) {
				misc.println("Error saving server reports..");
			}
	}
}

}

Read full topic
